snippet: The work of Esther Kroon, a photographer who was murdered at age 25 in Guatemala, appears in a new book by Willem van Zoetendaal and Rineke Dijkstra.
abstract: The work of Esther Kroon, a photographer who was murdered at age 25 in Guatemala, appears in a new book by Willem van Zoetendaal and Rineke Dijkstra.

headline.main: Discovering a Young Photographer, and Her Tragic Tale
